titles.title: A joint resolution making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1988, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Appropriations Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-414.
Committee on Rules Granted a Rule Providing One Hour of Debate; Waiving All Points of Order.
Rules Committee Resolution H.Res.302 Reported to House.
Measure Considered in House as in the Committee of the Whole.

vote.text: Passed House (Amended) by Yea-Nay Vote: 256 - 159 (Record Vote No: 415).

calendar.text: Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 428.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 11/5/1987--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #415 (256-159)) Extends the deadline for availability of certain continuing appropriations for FY 1988 until December 16, 1987.
